messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] tasting smegma
messages.msgSnippet: Here comes another one!  Smegma!  (Python fans remember Mr. Smegma???) ... From: jmcseals SEALS To: unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com Sent: Monday, June 09,
messages.messageBody:
Here comes another one! Smegma! (Python fans remember Mr. Smegma???)
----- Original Message -----
From: jmcseals SEALS
To: unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Monday, June 09, 2003 9:57 AM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] tasting smegma


<<Smegma is like crotchal ear-wax.>>

I'm having a highly immature moment because I really want to send this about
a thousand times, just to laugh everytime it comes through!

But, just so as not to piss yo all off, I'll just do it once! <BWG>

Jennifer
